text: Va kofironro guruh-guruh ʙa cahannam ʙironand. Cun ʙa cahannam rasand, darhojas kusoda savad va nigahʙononi otas gujand: «ci guna Allohro nofarmonʙardori karded va ma'ʙudi ʙarhaq ʙudanasro inkor karded, ojo pajomʙarone az xudi sumo ʙar sumo firistoda nasudaand, to ojoti Parvardigoratonro ʙarojaton ʙixonand va sumoro az didor ʙo cunin ruze ʙitarsonand?» Kofiron iqror suda megujand: «Bale». Pajomʙaroni ʙarhaq firistodasuda ʙudand va moro az in ruz ʙim kardand, vale ʙar kofiron farmoni azoʙ muhaqqaq suda ʙud
